website_summaries.verdict: A simple programmable drip coffee maker from a trusted name in kitchen appliances.
pros: With its respectable 12-cup capacity, this coffee maker is big enough for large families
Comes with a built-in charcoal water filter
Can be programmed up to 24 hours in advance
Users tend to be pleased with the brew quality
cons: Some users have issues with leakage

website_summaries.verdict: Less expensive alternative to our top pick with many user-friendly features and a vivid display.
pros: Easy to program so you can enjoy a cup of coffee in the morning without having to wait
Controls are user-friendly and an indicator lets you know when it's time to clean the machine
Users liked the attractive, modern design
cons: Clock doesn't keep time very well
Model is refurbished, which may concern some consumers

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer issue, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking product and it makes excellent coffee. It gets only one star because the first night I had it all the water drained out if the reservoir onto my counter. I thought I may have not seated the reservoir correctly but that was not it. This item leaks. Read other reviews to confirm this is not a one off issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jax B

customer_reviews.title: Make the best coffee ever
customer_reviews.text: Hello. My name is Fay, and I am a coffee snob. Community Signature Blend brewed in a Kitchen Aid Drip pot is all I will drink. I bought my first Kitchen Aid pot like this 10 years ago, and it brews a perfect pot of coffee in about 5 minutes. When I recently bought a 2nd home, I immediately purchased another Kitchen Aid pot as much like the first one as I could find. The model number has changed but it makes coffee just as delicious and just as fast as the first one I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Cook@Heart

customer_reviews.title: but this is NOT a good product. The "Brew" button appears to be defective
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to usually comment, but this is NOT a good product. The "Brew" button appears to be defective. It takes me anywhere from 3 to 15 pushes to get the pot to start brewing. It also seems to be a MUCH cheaper version of other KitchenAid products. Not the quality I have come to expect. Save your money and spend a bit more on a pot that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I liked the way the water container separated from the unit ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this for several years and it gave up the ghost. I liked the way the water container separated from the unit allowing direct access to the sink faucet. Sometimes the coffee would be lukewarm... hey, the nuker was just above and to the left... no big deal. Often, in the later stages, the water would not flow and I would have to jiggle the filter device. Ouch, hot steam. I just adapted to things until the wife ordered a Capresso MG600. Night and day. The Capresso has hot coffee every time and it tastes much, much better. I thought if you dripped water on coffee grounds it would all taste the same. Not so.
customer_reviews.author: Thumper

customer_reviews.title: I am happily buying one more today and i may jus get ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this coffee maker years ago. I use this at least twice daily. Never cleaned it, just used it for coffee, noodles, tea, instant meals while traveling and hooked up to an inverter or at a hotel. Finally after im sure 4 times longer than my last several programable coffee maker. I am happily buying one more today and i may jus get one for 2020 when todays newone finally dies.
customer_reviews.author: Iggy Monster

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit I have purchased in 15 years. Unfortunately, the hot plate is not as hot as it use to be. The new unit does not get coffee hot. It maintains heat for a freshly brewed pot, but it can not re-heat a pot of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: dewdew

customer_reviews.title: I purchased in April 2016. I have had many ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased in April 2016. I have had many kitchen aid coffee pots and have never had a problem. However this pot has a pin that holds the lid to water reservoir and its sticking out on one side and the water tank will not go in properly. I just found out that I cannot return the time window is up.
customer_reviews.author: Robin P.

customer_reviews.title: Ich
customer_reviews.text: The programmable feature leaves a lot to be desired. The most maddening aspect is the indicator light of being programmed is too bright a n.v d flashes constantly driving one nuts unless a dish cloth is put over it to block it out. There's Too Many Steps On The Menu To Arrive At The Desired Time For Turing On Kitchen Aid Pryor Version Was Far Superior
customer_reviews.author: Terry Allan

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Aid coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I was finally very satisfied after I received the second coffee maker- the first which arrived in one day was missing a valve in the water tank and the water just ran out- I contacted you and you authorized a return but NO replacement- I had TO RE-ORDER, which was another inconvenience. I know you have no control over product maker's quality control but - If there are any charges for returning a defective product - you may loose a good customer =pass it back to the manufacturer it embarrassed you as well as me. Otherwise the product is a basically good product
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Anderson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressed with this coffee maker it is very poorly made for a KitchenAid brand. It is not worth the money. It is however easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: always cleaning up water
customer_reviews.text: The lids are always pouring condensed water on the machine and counter whenever you open them. Other than that, it makes coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: A bit disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Slow brewing time. There is NO indicator when the brewing cycle ends. What their is an indicator that the keep warm cycle has ended after two hours. care is required when re-placing the water tank two small prongs must be lined up.
customer_reviews.author: bernard rudner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why the negative reviews. I love this coffee maker. It makes wonderful coffee (esp. with the "Bold" setting). It's relatively compact also--much shorter than the Cuisinart coffeemaker I'm replacing, even though it still makes 12 cups of coffee. I have a small kitchen, so that is definitely a plus for me. I have had no trouble with the removable water tank. It's a very handy feature, in fact. Also it's nice it has a water filter. I would definitely recommend this coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy H.

customer_reviews.title: bought again!
customer_reviews.text: When our old one finally died, we bought another one!
customer_reviews.author: True Fan

customer_reviews.title: Who the heck designed the coffee pot?
customer_reviews.text: The CM works fine. A few not to intuitive things to learn to set the clock and timer but not bad. What is really poorly designed is there's a space between the glass pot and the plastic rim that holds the cover. This space traps the coffee or soap water and doesn't allow you to pour out all the liquid in the pot! No matter how hard you try! Why didn't they seel the plastic rim to the glass so it doesn't trap liquid? You are constantly cleaning the liquid that drips down from the rim seam. Really bad design. And I have to think not very sanitary. Would not buy another because of this issue. Thank you, Neal Boynton
customer_reviews.author: Neal L. Boynton

customer_reviews.title: This is a durable, good coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: I love my higher grade KitchenAide coffee maker. Best gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Brewer
customer_reviews.text: Genuine Kitchenaid quality. Easy setup and brews a perfect cup of coffee every time.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and has lots of features but
customer_reviews.text: I don't have time to write all the troubles we have had with this coffee maker! It looks nice and has lots of features but....too many pots of coffee down the drain to count! DO NOT BUY THIS MODEL!
customer_reviews.author: DEB BEHSELICH

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to its advertising.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very unhappy with this coffe pot. It leaks and finally gave up making coffee. I had to replace it after only 2 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The problem is it CONSTANTLY drips when the carafe is removed!
customer_reviews.author: the00carmanoflasvegas                                                        oocarmanDuane R. KROLOP

customer_reviews.title: Nice coffee pot - just stopped working after less than 1 year of use
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Feb 2018 from Amazon and the coffee maker just stopped working yesterday. Very frustrating. Is the life-span of a coffee maker now one year????
customer_reviews.author: mary c thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the style/look, ease of use, speed of brewing, and the over-all experience. Enjoying my first pot of coffee with it already....
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The filter system gets clogged up and over flows all the time
customer_reviews.author: Book

customer_reviews.title: great maker
customer_reviews.text: Brews up a great hot pot of coffee will buy another when this one brews its last pot.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schrank

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the older model.
customer_reviews.text: The clock loses time quickly... Needs resetting every few days. Stays very wet inside from condensed steam. Makes a mess on the counter when you open the lid.
customer_reviews.author: william knose

customer_reviews.title: Even if you change the grind of the coffee the coffee isn't as good as similar makers with cone filters
customer_reviews.text: The flat bottom filter makes very week coffee. Even if you change the grind of the coffee the coffee isn't as good as similar makers with cone filters.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sloniewsky

customer_reviews.title: Clock loses time!
customer_reviews.text: Clock loses 5 minutes daily so automatic morning drew is off everyday. I threw away the box or I would return! Very annoying to have to reset clock everyday.
customer_reviews.author: RIchard Shanty

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This the 2nd Kitchen Aid and I like it, although I hope this one lasts a little longer!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Struck

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one, the first finally stopped working after 10 years! it's an excellent coffee maker!
customer_reviews.author: Deltaleadr

customer_reviews.title: I truly love this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this coffee maker. It was a big upgrade from the old brewer it replaced. The removable water container is quite convenient and much desired. It was easy to program and makes a great cup of coffee. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marilee Eiman

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Everything looked great upon arrival. Problem is everytime we tried to make coffee, water leaked from under unit. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Claxton

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a four cup pot but I am happy with the 12cup
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my coffee pot. I only wish kitchen aid still manufactured the four cup coffee pot. I wanted a four cup pot but I am happy with the 12cup. My sister has the four one but she purchase it many years a go.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customers

customer_reviews.title: water drips all over when you open lid.  always lot of water on plate.  spout too small.
customer_reviews.text: always lot of water on plate. spout too small.water drips all over when you open lid
customer_reviews.author: CRICKET  CARRANZA

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid 12-cup glass carafe coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Not too pleased with it. Water comes out all over the counter, when pouring it into the coffee maker. The basket for the coffee is too small. Overall, not really pleased with it. Sorry that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Louise A. Ravert

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It still makes coffee, but not worth the money as timer and time buttons don’t work
customer_reviews.author: JUDITH A JEAN

customer_reviews.title: It was an awkward machine in general. Also when ...
customer_reviews.text: It was an awkward machine in general. Also when pouring coffee the steam comes thru the top vent & can burn your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Hathawa

customer_reviews.title: Glass Carafe is junk
customer_reviews.text: Glass Carafe broke threes times, very thin and fragile glass. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Devlin

customer_reviews.title: It Does Its Job
customer_reviews.text: We like it ... it makes good coffee. I wish it had a separate water tank that could be removed. Nevertheless, it works for us. I like its sleek look.
customer_reviews.author: J. T. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my parents. My mom said that it makes better coffee than her old coffeepot and she's really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: I love that you can remove the water holder and wash ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my Second one. I love that you can remove the water holder and wash it. The coffee stays hot too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not order
customer_reviews.text: I have had this coffee maker for 2 years and have nothing but problems with it. The timer says it's full/finished and it's only halfway through, the carafe leaks terribly when pouring coffee and goes everywhere. Do not recommend this coffee maker at all. Also the removable water fill was convenient but it cracked at the top where the handle is after only having for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Tanner

customer_reviews.title: The best coffee maker I"ve owned!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints on this coffee maker! No drips, no drips as you pour your cup! Easy to fill water reservoir makes that first cup perfect. Auto timer is easy to read and set. It looks like a high end appliance at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: aka loulou

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee pot
customer_reviews.text: We were in the market for a new coffee pot. We trust in the quality of Kitchen Aid Products, and decided to purchase thier brand. The automatic timer feature is so nice & reliable, perfect to wake up and have your coffee ready. It also has a feature to make bold coffee, which is a longer cycle but if you enjoy the rich flavored taste of coffee, you will love the bold feature. We are very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I ran the water through it to clean it out before 1st time use, then unplugged in. I plugged it back in and it would never come on again.
customer_reviews.author: Readon

customer_reviews.title: I like the coffee maker just fine so far.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it makes hot coffee fast. The last one the circuit board burned out and it was not very old so I am keeping my fingers crossed that does not happen with this one. I love kitchen aid products, they are usually very reliable, that is why we took a chance and bought a second coffee pot.
customer_reviews.author: Betty DeRock

customer_reviews.title: Coffee pot with a problem
customer_reviews.text: This pot has issues. Too much water hits the coffee which causes it to overrun the filter basket and then there is ground coffee in the pot. Then you don't realize you're drinking it until there is coffee grounds in your teeth. And this was not a full pot, only 7 cups. This happens once a week and I'm usually too sleepy to see the grounds in the first place. If I still had the box I would send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had same one before. Lasted a long time. Expecting the same.
customer_reviews.author: Richard F Merckel

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I received this earlier and I was so mad that the packaging was so terrible! The box was torn, wire is tangled, no water filters and the manual instruction was copied. Looks like someone had return it! I haven't try yet...hopefully the coffee maker works....
customer_reviews.author: cristina

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker. This is the best coffee maker I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaked all over counter
customer_reviews.text: First it looked like it was used...parts looked worn...then it leaked all over our counter...gave it a second chance and it leaked agaon
customer_reviews.author: TIP.PY TOES

customer_reviews.title: Great coffeemaker!
customer_reviews.text: I had to read the directions, which I always do anyway, and acquaint myself with how to use this jewel, but I LOVE it! The programmer works great, and the coffee is made fairly quickly. We always use the dark mode because we like rich coffee. This is almost as good as an espresso!
customer_reviews.author: GracefulGhost

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The carafe instantly broke. I can't seem to find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts one year
customer_reviews.text: Exactly one year to the date of purchase, and out of warranty, coffee maker no longer works. Think carefully before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Rondoni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like the coffee maker...the new glass carafe is soooo much better. It pours without spilling.
customer_reviews.author: carol j meyers

customer_reviews.title: Good coffeemaker but unnecessarily loud beeps
customer_reviews.text: Same as one we already have. I find the beeping when it starts brewing and when it's done annoying. You're not likely to forget your coffee! And it is loud enough to wake a sleeping person in a room down the hall.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: LASTED ALL OF 10 MONTHS AND NO RECOURSE FOR THE BUYER!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 8/2015 and it is deader than a door nail!! This is the second time I've bought a kitchen aid coffee maker and had them die on me. At least the other one lasted a couple of years. This is only 10 MONTHS OLD!!!! I am disappointed that Amazon (the seller) isn't offering to do anything. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri L. Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: The box came yesterday and I unpacked it this morning ...
customer_reviews.text: The box came yesterday and I unpacked it this morning I am giving a three star review because the package or box had no documentation on this unit or instructions for warranty.. I willl find out what the unit review is and amend this later if needed.
customer_reviews.author: AerieView

customer_reviews.title: Timer
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with the timer. It appears to be in default mode to brew at a set time. I find it frustrating to press the brew button and activate the process. The auto image always appears. It is a long process but I finally override the auto button and get brew. I worry that my daily game with pressing the brew, then auto, then brew buttons will eventulaay render the machine unuseable. I have consulted the manual. Useless. However, when I finally receive my brew, it's quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: great coffee
customer_reviews.text: one of the best brews fast . i get up in morning and coffees ready when I am..great value A1
customer_reviews.author: lawrence johonnett

customer_reviews.title: coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: The Kitchenaide coffee-maker was as described. I received it promptly. It was well packed. It has exceeded my expectations. Every morning I am able to enjoy a great cup of coffee. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: KITCHENAID 12 CUP COFFEE MAKER KCM111
customer_reviews.text: I AM NOT HAPPY WITH THIS NEW MODEL AT ALL. (KCM111) WHOEVER DESIGNED THIS DID NOT MAKE IT VERY USER FRIENDLY. AFTER MAKING COFFEE AND YOU GO TO TAKE OUT THE GROUNDS WATER FUNS ONTO THE TOP OF THE COFFEE MAKER AND ONTO THE HEATING ELEMENT. THEY NEED TO REFUND OUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: MR JIM

customer_reviews.title: loud and not hot coffee
customer_reviews.text: It has super loud beeps to announce "on" and "done brewing", The temperature is not hot at all making coffee very weak unless you use an absurd amount of grounds making this a very expensive pot of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Lemmons

customer_reviews.title: Runny coffee pot
customer_reviews.text: The Coffee maker is great and I like the reuseable coffee filter. It looks great and has nice easy to use features...But. Once the coffee is made and I go to pour the coffee from the pot to the cup the coffee runs down the front the pot and drips on the counter. I can't yet figure out why this is happening. If the coffee is sitting cold in the pot and I pour the coffee it doesn't run or drip down the front. Other than that it sis a good coffee maker..you just have to pour the coffee into your cup over the kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.author: thesneak1

customer_reviews.title: pot leaks when pouring
customer_reviews.text: I normally love Kitchen Aid products, but this one has been a disappointment for me. Trouble getting it to auto brew in the morning, coffee pot leaks/dips when pouring a cup. I don't need these frustrations, so I am seriously thinking of returning it and use my Keurig until I can find another one. For some reason, I have had the best luck with Mr. Coffee. They only last about a year for me, but for the price, a year works. Very unhappy and like my coffee ready in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: clo

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed - need a new one after 4 months of use!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this coffee maker because of the design and the brand name. It lasted 4 months. Yes we have hard water but we still feel like we took good care of it washing it frequently and running water through it. It started to take longer and longer to brew until it stopped working one morning. $60 for 4 month use, definitely not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with our Kitchen Aid coffee brewer
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our Kitchen Aid coffee brewer. Very nice and got the best price from Amazon versus some of the other places we looked.
customer_reviews.author: sharon Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Clock Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Excellent coffee maker- HOWEVER , there are numerous complaints about the clock not keeping accurate time. This is an issue if you use the clock and/or use the auto brew feature. Manufacturer could care less.... don't even bother with them. I have owned two of this model that keep lousy time.
customer_reviews.author: horseman1954

customer_reviews.title: Remote Coffee
customer_reviews.text: This was a smart purchase since I work from home. It was a modern addition (upgrade) to my kitchen. You have an option to use the water filter inside, which I like. It holds up great and has brewed over 1000 cups of coffee since my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BREWED COFFEE
customer_reviews.text: love, love, love the coffee favor, brew time. Only problem is pot is difficult to pour from pot to cup or to a storage cafer. Limited hand mobility makes transfer difficult. Had my last KitchenAid Coffee Maker over 20 years and it was wonderful, just hated to see it wear out.
customer_reviews.author: klimintineAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have had zero problems with this nice machine. I set it up with the paper ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had zero problems with this nice machine. I set it up with the paper filter holder(w/2 filters) and the stainless steel (or whatever) holder. All sediment is removed.......the stuff that sticks to your tongue. So far(3 months), totally worth the price - $60.
customer_reviews.author: Billy2u

customer_reviews.title: Just a bad design. I would not buy this particular model ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't keep the coffee very hot, to open the lid to put the coffe in, the open lid drips water every time and needs to be wiped off. Just a bad design. I would not buy this particular model Kitchenaid again.
customer_reviews.author: CBASTIA

customer_reviews.title: Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Clock does not keep good time. Must be reset almost every day. Not a problem for us since we don’t depend on that clock.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Floccare

customer_reviews.title: Best Coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use. Easy to clean. Best coffee maker I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: kitchenAid coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: coffee maker looked brand new even tho was advertised as used.....the Carafe leaks in the front so pouring is messy.....too much trouble to send it back so it goes on the shelf....all i needed was the carafe for a KithchenAid coffee maker i already have so now i have almost two white elephants.....I bought a Cusinart grind and brew from Amazon and drinking coffee again...
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Maestas

customer_reviews.title: Only Problem is the Carafe
customer_reviews.text: Great features: The coffee comes out really HOT and stays hot. That is the first thing I wanted. Coffee tastes really good. Big Negative: The carafe spills coffee no matter how I pour the coffee; slowly, quickly, straight on or at a slight angle. I called the company and they are sending out a new carafe. I asked if they changed the style and they have not. Skeptical that this new pot will make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the convenient that I can fill it with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenient that I can fill it with the water without using the pot. It takes for ever to brew coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: Best of the Best - this coffeemaker exceeded my expectations. I had a brand new Mr Coffee which made a great cup of Joe but the pot leaked and it got increasingly frustrating. I would recommend this coffeemaker to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Powers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a super model at a great price. It's stylish and makes great coffee. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this a few weeks now. It does have a lot of water vapor, but the coffee is great. I like the fact that the water reservoir is removable so it can be cleaned occasionally. We use this every morning with the timer set to go on by itself in the morning. Also it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: I just love this maker
customer_reviews.text: I just love this maker, my old one have not quite given up so I am ready with a spare..
customer_reviews.author: BarbFrederick

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee maker. Only complaint is that one of the top hinges came apart and was a major pain to fix. But the coffee is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Burwell

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee brewing
customer_reviews.text: Our second KitchenAid Coffee Maker - makes absolutely wonderful coffee, easy to use and clean up and very well designed to prepare for brewing without a mess. However, the first maker only lasted about a year. Will see how we fare with this model again for longevity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love,  wonderful machine, great coffee.  It even signals when to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! Wish I had bought it years ago
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: brought the same coffee maker from a anchor store for twice as much, love this product, thanks amazon, arrived perfect.
customer_reviews.author: shihtzulover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and makes a good cup of Joe. Get one, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Clay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fill with water
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to find a coffee maker with a removable water reservoir. This one fits the bill quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Basket Lady

customer_reviews.title: Review of KitchenAid 12-Cup Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this item again, and this is said after purchasing a number of KitchenAid products, including a previous coffee maker. Getting the coffee to brew without using auto is a pain and the filters do not remove or insert easily.
customer_reviews.author: patricia whelehan

customer_reviews.title: It would have been better if you didn't have to fill the reservoir every ...
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker burnt out after only having it for 1 year. I don't recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Katt

customer_reviews.title: would not buy again - for the money
customer_reviews.text: not as functional as I had assumed. the 1-4 cup option does nothing that I can determine. I filled the water tank and selected 1-4cup option expecting only that amount to brew. it brews whatever amount of water is in the tank. attempting to set the timer is tricky. hold the brew button and hope it does not start. update: other comments about excess water when you open the top is accurate! it goes everywhere. the more I use the unit, the less satisfied I become.
customer_reviews.author: SWilson

customer_reviews.title: Not Functional
customer_reviews.text: This cofffee pot arrived with a scratched top and no warranty card. Looked like somone else's returned item. The clear window to show how much water you are pouring in is all the way around on the back. You would have to turn the coffee pot all the way around to see how much water was being poured into it. What sense does that make? Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ellenvp

customer_reviews.title: Coffee tastes like plastic
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with a chipped carafe which Kitchenaid promptly replaced. The real problem with this pot is the coffee tastes like plastic. We have been using it for two weeks and have lessened the odor/taste with multiple cleanings, white vinegar washes and finally cleaning with coffee pot cleaner. We are going to give this another couple of days and then back it goes if there no further improvement
customer_reviews.author: rdp

customer_reviews.title: It drips big time when you pour
customer_reviews.text: My husband is unhappy with this coffee maker. We had a kitchenAid before and liked it just fine. But this one you just can't pour with out making a puddle all over the counter top.
customer_reviews.author: ann hayden

customer_reviews.title: The coffee maker keeps dripping, when the carafe removed...
customer_reviews.text: This makes a good coffee, like most of the coffee makers in this price range, but keeps dripping when the carafe removed, even after the the coffee is finished brewing. Just like the one I had a few years ego, evidently KitchenAid didn't fix it. Returned the coffee maker and went with Braun, at least it doesn't drip and makes just as good coffee if not better...
customer_reviews.author: Pannon

customer_reviews.title: very misleading,
customer_reviews.text: very misleading,this coffee maker just looks stylish the carafe needs to be either a little taller or @ the top where the water spout thingy meets with the carafe all i know i shouldn't have to raise the carafe myself or put something metal underneath the carafe to raise it so coffee can start dripping i most deffinatley want my money back asap
customer_reviews.author: Tylito Menendez

customer_reviews.title: No more Mr Coffee
customer_reviews.text: We have always bought a MR Coffee. No more. This is much much better. It brews great and has all the features you want and need in a coffee pot. You can remove the water container in the back to fill with water or just pore for the coffee pitcher itself. Looking forward to using this a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Pops

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy this Coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: The worse coffee maker I have ever purchased . The product broke after 6 weeks beyond the authorized return period, so now I am out the money I spent and I need another coffeemaker, I will not buy another product from this manufacturer. Not worth the money I spent.
customer_reviews.author: J. THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Bad Brew button
customer_reviews.text: Brew button got stuck and dislodged on 2nd use. Had to pry it back out with a knife and have continued to deal with it. It makes good coffee though.
customer_reviews.author: DFA

product_meta.title: KitchenAid KCM111OB 12-Cup Glass Carafe Coffee Maker - Onyx Black
product_meta.description: Glass carafe coffee maker has an extra large digital LED display to show the brew cycle, warm indicator, brew strength indicator to choose between regular and bold strengths, 1 to 4 cup indicator, and cleaning need indicator. Features: clear removable water tank, 24- programmable, pause and serve feature, auto shut-off, clock, and flat brew basket. Includes replaceable charcoal filter and gold-toned filter.
feature_bullets: Glass carafe coffee maker has an extra large digital LED display to show the brew cycle, warm indicator, brew strength indicator to choose between regular and bold strengths, 1 to 4 cup indicator, and cleaning need indicator
Features: clear removable water tank, 24- programmable, pause and serve feature, auto shut-off, clock, and flat brew basket
Includes replaceable charcoal filter and gold-toned filter
